alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 8:54PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Allen, Defiance, northern Paulding, northwestern Henry, southeastern Williams and Fulton Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 854 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blissfield to near Bryan to Woodburn. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Paulding around 910 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Archbold, Defiance, Wauseon and Delta. This includes Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 24 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
